thread.title: Rudy Gobert's buzzer-beating tip-in gives Jazz overtime win over Kings
thread.title_full: Rudy Gobert's buzzer-beating tip-in gives Jazz overtime win over Kings

author: Matt Ellentuck
title: Rudy Gobert's buzzer-beating tip-in gives Jazz overtime win over Kings
text:
WILD!
Rudy Gobert tipped a George Hill airball through the net in the final seconds of overtime to beat the Sacramento Kings, 110-109.
Initially the bucket was waved off for basket interference, which caused a lot of confusion until an official review. But the call was reversed.
Another one! @utahjazz stun Kings 110-109 in OT on Gobert's buzzer-beating redirect of Hill's errant J: https://t.co/H9Vbv19nwH #TakeNote pic.twitter.com/czqPaehdhf 
â€” NBA.com (@NBAcom) March 6, 2017 
All seven feet, one inch of the Jazz big man came in handy to redirect what would have been a terrible looking airball to end a bad loss to the DeMarcus Cousins-less Kings.
Gobert finished with 16 points on 8-of-12 shooting and 24 rebounds in the win.
